short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access companies's glassdoor site straight from indeed

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you job-hunting? Do you want to know what employees think of their own company? Look no further, indgalss makes it easy to look for companies on glassdoor. Save time by using indglass. The extension inserts the glassdoor icon next to the company name, when clicked it will retrieve the companiesâ€™ glassdoor url and take you straight to their site.
